rows.label: tlk4632017401_msg0001
rows.name:
I am preaching the teachings
of Acedia to all who are
willing to listen.

rows.label: tlk4632017401_msg0002
rows.name:
As long as there is breath in your
body, it is never too late to make
a better life for yourself.

rows.label: tlk4632017401_msg0003
rows.name:
The teachings of Pope Marveni
saved me from my own sin, and
they can do the same for you.

rows.label: tlk4632017401_msg0004
rows.name:
Now let us pray together and
build a brighter future!
